message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.HC, cs.RO

This paper deals with the problem of facial expression recognition from videos, which is a subfield of computer vision (cs.CV). The use of Conditional Random Forests (CRF) for capturing spatio-temporal patterns is a machine learning technique (cs.LG). The paper also mentions the use of head pose estimation, which is a topic in multimedia (cs.MM) and human-computer interaction (cs.HC). Finally, the use of multiple viewpoints suggests the possibility of robotics applications (cs.RO).
